scenes.description: Ichijou Ririka is sitting on a throne, accidentally pressing a button that causes an explosion.
A shadowy, corrupted version of Ririka crawls on the floor, expressing frustration and promising revenge.
Performance of the song 'SUPER DUPER' by ReGLOSS members.
MC section after the song where the members discuss their performances and express gratitude.

subtitles.original: オッケー！ホットドッグ！
subtitles.english: Okay! Hot dog!

subtitles.original: あ、ごめんなさい、ボタン押しちゃった！
subtitles.english: Oh, sorry, I pressed the button!

subtitles.original: な、なにやってんだー！
subtitles.english: Wh-What was I doing?!

subtitles.original: もう、このゲームなんて、こりごりだー！
subtitles.english: Ugh, I'm so done with this game!

subtitles.original: 次は、みんなに仕返ししてやるからなー！
subtitles.english: Next time, I'm going to get back at everyone!

subtitles.original: どうも、ReGLOSSです！
subtitles.english: Hello, we are ReGLOSS!

subtitles.original: しびれて、みんな一緒に楽しんでね！
subtitles.english: Get excited and let's have fun together!

subtitles.original: 画面の前でも、声出していこう！
subtitles.english: Even in front of your screens, let's hear your voices!

subtitles.original: 行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: 目くるめく好奇心を忍ばせましょう
subtitles.english: Let's harbor our dazzling curiosity

subtitles.original: 行方、神様さえも知らぬ場所
subtitles.english: To a place where even God doesn't know the destination

subtitles.original: 待ちきれない情熱が
subtitles.english: This uncontrollable passion

subtitles.original: 詰まった今日、肴で例えよう
subtitles.english: That fills today, let's compare it to a side dish

subtitles.original: 寝付きの悪い夜も、途方もないBad newsも
subtitles.english: Even sleepless nights and endless bad news

subtitles.original: 目まぐるしい時代も全部
subtitles.english: And even these dizzying times, all of it

subtitles.original: 豪逆の彼方へ笑い飛ばそう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh them off into the distance of arrogance

subtitles.original: 君だ、ビビディ・バビディ・ブー
subtitles.english: It's you, bibbidi-babbidi-boo

subtitles.original: 行くよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: SUPER DUPER オートクチュールのシャングリラ
subtitles.english: SUPER DUPER, an haute couture Shangri-La

subtitles.original: 弾き切れるまで踊るのよ
subtitles.english: Dance until you've played it all out

subtitles.original: 誰かが何と言おうと、気にしないリミッター解除
subtitles.english: No matter what anyone says, release the limiters without a care

subtitles.original: そう、ただ楽しむだけ
subtitles.english: That's right, just enjoy it

subtitles.original: 美しい声を響かせて
subtitles.english: Let your beautiful voice ring out

subtitles.original: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Ah ah
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Ah ah

subtitles.original: 俯いた世界を変えてみせよう
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can change this downcast world

subtitles.original: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! SUPER DUPER
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! SUPER DUPER

subtitles.original: 焦がし、求めていた、時を経て逆転
subtitles.english: Burning with desire, seeking it out, a reversal through time

subtitles.original: とっくに決めてる、激アツ覚醒
subtitles.english: I've already decided, a super-heated awakening

subtitles.original: 転生しても、もう一度ここへCome back
subtitles.english: Even if I'm reincarnated, I'll come back here again

subtitles.original: 人生そのものがセンセーショナルな漫画
subtitles.english: Life itself is a sensational manga

subtitles.original: 惹きながら一躍、羽ばたいて鳥になれ
subtitles.english: Charming everyone as you take flight, become a bird

subtitles.original: 一番目指し、走り出せ、地に足付け自由にさあ
subtitles.english: Aim for the top, start running, plant your feet and be free

subtitles.original: 巷を揺らす、大騒ぎ
subtitles.english: A huge commotion shaking the streets

subtitles.original: 浮き足立ったって問題ない
subtitles.english: It's fine even if you're restless

subtitles.original: ざわついた胸の奥、愛して止まないもの
subtitles.english: Deep in my restless heart, the things I love endlessly

subtitles.original: 疑うことも知らないまま
subtitles.english: Without even knowing how to doubt

subtitles.original: そう、一世一代、覚悟はできてるよ
subtitles.english: Yes, once in a lifetime, I'm prepared

subtitles.original: 君だ、君だ、未来だ
subtitles.english: It's you, it's you, it's the future

subtitles.original: SUPER DUPER オートクチュールのシャングリラ
subtitles.english: SUPER DUPER, an haute couture Shangri-La

subtitles.original: 弾き切れるまで踊るのよ
subtitles.english: Dance until you've played it all out

subtitles.original: 誰かが何と言おうと、気にしないリミッター解除
subtitles.english: No matter what anyone says, release the limiters without a care

subtitles.original: そう、ただ楽しむだけ
subtitles.english: That's right, just enjoy it

subtitles.original: 美しい声を響かせて
subtitles.english: Let your beautiful voice ring out

subtitles.original: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Ah ah
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Ah ah

subtitles.original: 俯いた世界を変えてみせよう
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can change this downcast world

subtitles.original: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! SUPER DUPER
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! SUPER DUPER

subtitles.original: 一喜一憂も、一語一向さ、注いで、一心同体でいて
subtitles.english: Ups and downs, every single word, pour it out, stay as one heart and body

subtitles.original: 今宵なき、恋したメロディと
subtitles.english: Tonight's gone, with the melody I fell in love with

subtitles.original: 会えなくて、離したレプリカ
subtitles.english: Unable to meet, the replica I let go of

subtitles.original: 名もなき君との境界線を、超え、リフレイン
subtitles.english: Crossing the boundary with the nameless you, refrain

subtitles.original: やった！
subtitles.english: We did it!

subtitles.original: SUPER DUPER オートクチュールのシャングリラ
subtitles.english: SUPER DUPER, an haute couture Shangri-La

subtitles.original: 弾き切れるまで踊るのよ
subtitles.english: Dance until you've played it all out

subtitles.original: 誰かが何と言おうと、気にしないリミッター解除
subtitles.english: No matter what anyone says, release the limiters without a care

subtitles.original: そう、ただ楽しむだけ
subtitles.english: That's right, just enjoy it

subtitles.original: 美しい声を響かせて
subtitles.english: Let your beautiful voice ring out

subtitles.original: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Ah ah
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Ah ah

subtitles.original: 俯いた世界を変えてみせよう
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can change this downcast world

subtitles.original: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! SUPER DUPER
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! Yeah yeah! SUPER DUPER

subtitles.original: いえーい！お疲れ様でしたー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Good job everyone!

subtitles.original: いやぁ、最後のSUPER DUPER、ちょっと、言っちゃった！
subtitles.english: Wow, that last SUPER DUPER, I kind of said it!

subtitles.original: ごめんね、ごめんね。かまわよ、かまわよ、全然いいよ！
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry. It's okay, it's okay, no problem at all!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！ソロパートと、えー、ユニット曲
subtitles.english: Thank you very much! You heard the solo parts and, um, the unit song

subtitles.original: 「SUPER DUPER」聴いていただきましたが、
subtitles.english: 'SUPER DUPER,' but

subtitles.original: 青くん、感動したよ、SSS！
subtitles.english: Ao-kun, I was moved, SSS!

subtitles.original: いや、めっちゃ上手かったよ！凄かったよ！
subtitles.english: No, you were really good! It was amazing!

subtitles.original: 僕、絶対ホロライブに入って3Dお披露目する時は
subtitles.english: I had decided that I would definitely sing

subtitles.original: 絶対歌うって決めてました。
subtitles.english: when I joined Hololive and had my 3D debut.

subtitles.original: 歌わせていただきありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you for letting me sing!

subtitles.original: シャンパンも最高だったよ！
subtitles.english: The champagne was great too!

subtitles.original: いや、あ、それはちょっと、なんか、途中でゴフッてなってた...
subtitles.english: Well, uh, that was a little... I kind of choked in the middle...

subtitles.original: ちなみにシャンパンコールはオリジナルです！
subtitles.english: By the way, the champagne call is an original!

subtitles.original: いえーい！で、ね、らでんちゃんのも凄かったよ！
subtitles.english: Yay! And, you know, Raden-chan's was amazing too!

subtitles.original: 今までの集大成的な感じだったね！
subtitles.english: It felt like a culmination of everything so far!

subtitles.original: はい、そうです。えっと、今回ですね、
subtitles.english: Yes, that's right. For this time,

subtitles.original: 撮影にご協力いただきました、箱根ガラスの森美術館さん、
subtitles.english: we received cooperation for the filming from the Hakone Glass Forest Museum,

subtitles.original: ポーラ美術館さん、本当にありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: and the Pola Museum of Art. Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: いえーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ピチエダンスもめちゃくちゃ可愛かったよ！
subtitles.english: The Pichi-e dance was also super cute!
